email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope you're doing well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel is the MV Oceanic Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight quote is $52.50 per ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to discuss further. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Could you consider $51.00 per ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I can lower the freight rate to $51.50 per ton, but that's the best I can do. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.50 per ton is acceptable. Please confirm the laycan remains 15-20 October and the demurrage rate is $20,000 per day. Also, could you send over the full vessel details for our records? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. Yes, the laycan is confirmed for 15-20 October, and the demurrage rate is $20,000 per day. I’ll send over the full vessel details shortly. Let’s proceed with the fixture. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the confirmation. We’ll proceed with the fixture. Please send over the contract for review. Looking forward to working with you on this shipment. Best, John
